title: Nangiloc-Colignan Community Tackles Salinity
creator_contributor_role: Dept of Ag and Rural Affairs, production company
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Soil conservation
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Agriculture - Environmental aspects
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Irrigation - Murray River Region (N.S.W.-S. Aust.)
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Community organization
description: The Nangiloc - Colignan communtiy are working together to tackle the problem of increased salinity in the soil in the Sunraysia district. Farming and irrigation go hand in hand, and with community effort, the aim is to make sure that farming practices enrich rather tahn deplete a vital resource.
